command: until nslookup release-name-dragonfly-manager.default.svc.cluster.local && nc -vz release-name-dragonfly-manager.default.svc.cluster.local 8080; do echo waiting for manager; sleep 2; done;
initContainers.name: wait-for-manager

command:
password_aux="${MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD:-}"
if [[ -f "${MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD_FILE:-}" ]]; then
    password_aux=$(cat "$MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD_FILE")
fi
mysqladmin status -uroot -p"${password_aux}"

password_aux="${MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD:-}"
if [[ -f "${MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD_FILE:-}" ]]; then
    password_aux=$(cat "$MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD_FILE")
fi
mysqladmin status -uroot -p"${password_aux}"

password_aux="${MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD:-}"
if [[ -f "${MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD_FILE:-}" ]]; then
    password_aux=$(cat "$MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD_FILE")
fi
mysqladmin status -uroot -p"${password_aux}"
until nslookup release-name-dragonfly-manager.default.svc.cluster.local && nc -vz release-name-dragonfly-manager.default.svc.cluster.local 8080; do echo waiting for manager; sleep 2; done;
initContainers.name: wait-for-manager

command: until nslookup release-name-dragonfly-scheduler.default.svc.cluster.local && nc -vz release-name-dragonfly-scheduler.default.svc.cluster.local 8002; do echo waiting for scheduler; sleep 2; done;
initContainers.name: wait-for-scheduler

command:
if [ ! -e "/run/dragonfly/net" ]; then
  touch /run/dragonfly/net
fi
i1=$(stat -L -c %i /host/ns/net)
i2=$(stat -L -c %i /run/dragonfly/net)
if [ "$i1" != "$i2" ]; then
  /bin/mount -o bind /host/ns/net /run/dragonfly/net
fi
initContainers.name: mount-netns

command: until nslookup release-name-redis-master.default.svc.cluster.local && nc -vz release-name-redis-master.default.svc.cluster.local 6379; do echo waiting for redis; sleep 2; done;
initContainers.name: wait-for-redis

command: until nslookup release-name-mysql.default.svc.cluster.local && nc -vz release-name-mysql.default.svc.cluster.local 3306; do echo waiting for mysql; sleep 2; done;
initContainers.name: wait-for-mysql
